org.apache.karaf.profile.impl

Class Profiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.karaf.profile.impl.Profiles

  • public final class Profiles
extends java.lang.Object
    Static utilities to work with profiles.

    • Method Detail

      • loadProfiles

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Profile> loadProfiles(java.nio.file.Path root)
                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Loads profiles from given directory path. A profile is represented as directory with .profile extension. Subdirectories constitute part of Profile.getId() - directory separators are changed to -. For example, profile contained in directory mq/broker/standalone.profile will have id = mq-broker-standalone.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • deleteProfile

      • writeProfile

        public static void writeProfile(java.nio.file.Path root,
                                Profile profile)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Writes given Profile under a path specified as root. Directory name to store a profile is derived from Profile.getId()
        Parameters:
        root -
        profile -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getOverlay

        public static Profile getOverlay(Profile profile,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Profile> profiles,
                                 java.lang.String environment)

        Gets an overlay profile for given profile, where passed in map of additional profiles is searched for possible parent profiles of given profile.

        environment may be used to select different variants of profile configuration files. For example, if environment is specified, configuration for my.pid PID will be read from my.pid.cfg#<environment>.

        Parameters:
        profile -
        profiles -
        environment -
        Returns:

      • getEffective

        public static Profile getEffective(Profile profile,
                                   java.util.Collection<PlaceholderResolver> resolvers,
                                   boolean finalSubstitution)

        Gets an effective profile for given profile. Effective profile has all property placeholders resolved. When finalSubstitution is true, placeholders that can't be resolved are replaced with empty strings. When it's false, placeholders are left unchanged.

        Parameters:
        profile -
        resolvers -
        finalSubstitution -
        Returns:
